Room.Name: Broken Wall
Room.ShortDescription: You are near a collapsed and broken wall under the castle of Prince Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: A trickle of water coming from the tunnel to the north disappears into a hole in the floor, gurgling and swirling as it goes. Looks like the tunnel continued to the southeast long ago, but now the way is blocked by a collapsed wall. Directly south is a castle guard station. Only the lowest recruits are assigned to this miserable duty, and they spend most of their time sleeping and playing cards. North is a group of cells where the castle's petty thieves and criminals are kept.
